price: Ata thanë: “O Musa! Ose hidh ti, ose të hedhim ne të parët shkopinjtë tanë!”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
